Title: Telerik Extensions For ASP.NET MVC
Description: Telerik Extensions for ASP.NET MVC are UI components, based on jQuery. Available components include Grid, DatePicker, WYSIWYG HTML Editor, Window, TabStrip, TreeView and extensions for CSS and JavaScript compression & combining.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Telerik Extensions for ASP.NET MVC is a lightweight framework helping you build rich user interfaces for ASP.NET MVC while enhancing your productivity.

The framework is licensed under GPL and is not suitable for use in commercial projects. For details regarding the GPL licensing, please refer to the public GPL license terms, or contact your legal advisor.

Note: Since mid-2013 the development of Telerik Extensions for ASP.NET MVC is discontinued and the product been superseded by Telerik UI for ASP.NET MVC. While both products have shared objectives, Telerik UI for ASP.NET MVC has three main advantages over the classic Telerik Extensions for ASP.NET MVC:
  • Device reach: Itâ€™s built on top of Kendo UI, Telerik HTML5 and JavaScript framework
  • Modularity: You can leverage the client and server pieces independently or together
  • Completeness: It offers 70+ UI extensions

Features and Components

  • Based on jQuery
  • Fluent syntax
  • Support for multiple view engines like Razor, Spark, NHaml, along with the default Webforms engine
  • Web asset (JavaScript and CSS) management
    • Combination - to reduce the number of requests made to the web server (as best practices suggest)
    • GZIP compression - to save bandwidth
    • Grouping - combine and compress individual groups of web assets
    • CDN support - deploy your web assets on a Content Distribution Network and easily link them in your ASP.NET MVC application
  • Highly accessible, covering the WCAG 2.0 Level A across all components
  • Available components
    • Grid - supporting paging/sorting/filtering, as well as advanced features like grouping, hierarchy and master/detail views
    • HTML WYSIWYG Editor - simple, cross-browser consistent HTML editing
    • ComboBox
    • Calendar
    • Chart
    • Date, Time and DateTimePicker
    • Menu
    • NumericTextBox (with currency, percentage and integer flavors)
    • PanelBar (Accordion)
    • Slider and RangeSlider
    • Splitter
    • TabStrip
    • TreeView
    • Upload
    • Window

No DLLs?

Only the source code is hosted at CodePlex. If you want binaries or the latest bugfixes, please use NuGet to include the library in your project.
